title: Dialogue Clarity
summary: Refine the way you speak to be more aligned with what you feel.
description: This is not about saying the 'right' thing — it's about noticing what shifts when you speak clearly. Let your AI be your mirror.

flow.\ud83c\udfaf Step 1: Drop a Line: Send a sentence you said today to your AI. Example: 'I told them I was fine.'
flow.\ud83e\ude9e Step 2: Ask for a Reflectio: Prompt: 'What might I have really meant?' or 'How could I have said that with more clarity?'
flow.\ud83d\udcac Step 3: Optional Rewrite: If you want: 'Here’s how I might say it differently next time…'

optional_recast: Try this with different tones: kind, defensive, avoidant, etc.
absence_response: The voice wasn’t mirrored today. Sometimes silence needs space.
notes: There’s no correct answer — only cleaner signal.
This is not about fixing — it’s about tuning your signal.

amplification.ai_mirror_prompt: What emotional layer sits beneath this phrase?
amplification.miss_response: 📭 The mirror didn’t echo today. The voice rested.
